resources.string: This sample demonstrates how to implement the Equativ Display SDK in Android applications.
Simple banner integration. See implementation in BannerActivity.

Simple bidding banner integration. Click on the \'Load Banner Bidding Ad\' button to load a banner bidding ad, then click on the \'Render Banner Bidding Ad\' button to load the received bidding ad in the above banner view. See implementation in BannerBiddingActivity.
Banner integration in RecyclerView. See implementation in BannerInListActivity.
Simple interstitial integration. Click the load button to load an interstitial ad, then click the show button to display it. See implementation in InterstitialActivity.

Simple bidding interstitial integration. Click on the \'Load and render Interstitial Bidding Ad\' button to load an interstitial bidding ad and render it in a SASInterstitialManager, then click on the \'Show Interstitial Bidding Ad\' button to show the rendered interstitial ad. See implementation in BannerBiddingActivity.
Load and render \n Interstitial Bidding Ad
Native ad integration in RecyclerView. See implementation in NativeAdInListActivity.
